Lantern - Class in dungeonadventure.items
A lantern.
Lantern() - Constructor for class dungeonadventure.items.Lantern
Create a standard Lantern.
Lantern(String, String) - Constructor for class dungeonadventure.items.Lantern

Lightsource - Class in dungeonadventure.items
A lightsource that can be powered on.
Lightsource(String, String) - Constructor for class dungeonadventure.items.Lightsource
Create a new Lightsource with a name and description.
Lightsource(String, String, int) - Constructor for class dungeonadventure.items.Lightsource
Create a new Lightsource with a name, description and a visibility (in degrees).
listVisibleSpaces(HashMap<String, Space>) - Method in class dungeonadventure.Player
List visible spaces
look() - Method in class dungeonadventure.Player
Say what Player currently sees
lookLocationItems() - Method in class dungeonadventure.Player
Say the items that the Player currently sees
lookNextSpaces() - Method in class dungeonadventure.Player
List all the visible next spaces from the Player's current direction and based on their Lightsource.
